title: Grand Opening: Jumeirah Luxury Arrives on the Natural Shores of Saadiyat Island
description: Combining Jumeirah’s refined signature luxury with sustainability, Jumeirah at Saadiyat Island Resort is the newest property to open on the natural island of Saadiyat - off the coast of Abu Dhabi in the Persian Gulf. You’ll experience the country’s best natural beach with five-star indulgence only 15 minutes from the city centre. Includes decadent nightly dinners and lavish daily breakfast at your choice of multiple Jumeirah restaurants, access to the Observation Deck at 300 at Jumeirah at Etihad Towers in central Abu Dhabi, welcome glass of wine or beer on arrival, 20% off blissful spa treatments and more. Plus, the package is valid for two adults and one child (aged 11 years and under).
